Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yesu Kiristhuvinudaiya Suviseshaththin Aarambam.
2 idho, Naan En Thoodhanai Umakku Munbaaga Anuppugiren, Avan Umakku Munne Poi, Umakku Vazhiyai Aayaththampannuvaan Endrum;

3 karththarukku Vazhiyai Aayaththappaduththungal, Avarukkup Paadhaigalai Sevvaipannungal, Endru Vanaandharaththile Kooppidugiravanudaiya Saththam Undaagum Endrum, Theerkkadharisana Aagamangalil Ezhudhiyirukkira Piragaaramaai;
4 yovaan Vanaandharaththil Gnaanasnaanangoduththu, Paavamannippukkendru Manandhirumpudhalukketra Gnaanasnaanaththaik Kuriththup Pirasangam Pannikkondirundhaan.
5 appozhudhu Yoodheyaa Dhesaththaar Anaivarum Erusalem Nagaraththaar Yaavarum, Avanidaththirkuppoi, Thangal Paavangalai Arikkaiyittu, Yordhaan Nadhiyil Avanaal Gnaanasnaanam Petraargal.
6 yovaan Ottagamayir Udaiyaith Thariththu, Than Araiyil Vaarkachchaiyaik Kattikkondavanaayum, Vettukkiliyaiyum Kaattuththenaiyum Pusikkiravanaayum Irundhaan.
7 avan: Ennilum Vallavar Oruvar Enakkuppin Varugiraar, Avarudaiya Paadharatchaigalin Vaaraik Kunindhu Avizhkkiradharkum Naan Paaththiran Alla.
8 naan Jalaththinaal Ungalukku Gnaanasnaanam Koduththen; Avaro Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Ungalukku Gnaanasnaanam Koduppaar Endru Pirasangiththaan.
9 andha Naatkalil, Yesu Galileyaavilulla Naasareththoorilirundhu Vandhu, Yordhaan Nadhiyil Yovaanaal Gnaanasnaanam Petraar.
10 avar Jalaththilirundhu Karaiyerinavudane, Vaanam Thirakkappattadhaiyum, Aaviyaanavar Puraavaippol Thammel Irangugiradhaiyum Kandaar.
11 andriyum, Neer Ennudaiya Nesa Kumaaran, Ummil Piriyamaayirukkiren Endru, Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Saththam Undaayitru.
12 udane Aaviyaanavar Avarai Vanaandharaththirkup Pogumpadi Evinaar.
13 avar Vanaandharaththile Naarpadhunaal Irundhu, Saaththaanaal Sodhikkappattu, Ange Kaattumirugangalin Naduvile Sanjariththukkondirundhaar. Dhevathoodhargal Avarukku Oozhiyanseydhaargal.
14 yovaan Kaavalil Vaikkappatta Pinbu, Yesu Galileyaavile Vandhu, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththin Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththu:
15 kaalam Niraiveritru, Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Sameebamaayitru; Mananthirumbi, Suviseshaththai Visuvaasiyungal Endraar.
16 avar Galileyaak Kadaloramaai Nadandhupogaiyil, Meenpidikkiravargalaayirundha Seemonum, Avan Sagodharan Andhireyaavum Kadalil Valaipottukkondirukkirapodhu Avargalaik Kandaar.
17 yesu Avargalai Nokki: En Pinne Vaarungal, Ungalai Manusharaip Pidikkiravargalaakkuven Endraar.
18 udane Avargal Thangal Valaigalai Vittu, Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.
19 avar Avvidam Vittu Satru Appuram Ponapodhu, Sebadheyuvin Kumaaran Yaakkobum Avan Sagodharan Yovaanum Padavile Valaigalaip Pazhudhu Paarththukkondirukkiradhaik Kandu,
20 udane Avargalaiyum Azhaiththaar; Appozhudhu Avargal Thangal Thagappanaagiya Sebedheyuvaik Kooliyaatkalodu Padavile Vittu Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.
21 pinbu Kapparnagoomukkup Ponaargal. Udane Avar Oivunaalil Jeba Aalayaththile Piravesiththu, Podhagampanninaar.
22 avar Vedhapaaragaraippolap Podhiyaamal, Adhigaaramudaiyavaraai Avargalukkup Podhiththapadiyinaal, Avarudaiya Podhagaththaik Kuriththu Janangal Aachchariyappattaargal.
23 avargaludaiya Jebaaalayaththile Asuththa Aaviyulla Oru Manushan Irundhaan.
24 avan: Aiyo! Nasareyanaagiya Yesuve, Engalukkum Umakkum Enna? Engalaik Kedukkavaa Vandheer? Ummai Innaar Endru Ariven, Neer Dhevanudaiya Parisuththar Endru Saththamittaan.
25 adharku Yesu: Nee Pesaamal Ivanai Vittup Purappattuppo Endru Adhai Adhattinaar.
26 udane Andha Asuththa Aavi Avanai Alaikkazhiththu, Migundha Saththamittu, Avanaivittup Poivittadhu.

27 ellaarum Aachchariyappattu: Idhu Enna? Indhap Pudhiya Ubadhesam Eppadippattadhu? Ivar Adhigaaraththode Asuththa Aavigalukkum Kattalaiyidugiraar, Avaigal Ivarukkuk Keezhppadigiradhe Endru Thangalukkulle Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondaargal.
28 adhumudhal Avarudaiya Keerththi Galileyaa Naadengum Pirasiththamaayitru.
29 udane Avargal Jeba Aalayaththai Vittup Purappattu, Yaakkopodum Yovaanodunkooda, Seemon Andhireyaa Enbavargaludaiya Veettil Piravesiththaargal;
30 ange Seemonudaiya Maami Juramaaik Kidandhaal; Udane Avargal Avalaikkuriththu Avarukku Sonnaargal.
31 avar Kittappoi, Aval Kaiyaip Pidiththu, Avalaith Thookkivittaar; Udane Juram Avalai Vittu Neengitru; Appozhudhu Aval Avargalukkup Panividaiseydhaal.
32 saayangaalamaagi Sooriyan Asthamiththapodhu, Sagala Piniyaaligalaiyum, Pisaasupidiththavargalaiyum, Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal.
33 pattanaththaar Ellaarum Veettu Vaasalukku Munbaagak Koodivandhaargal.

34 palavidhamaana Viyaadhigalinaal Ubaththiravappattirundha Anegarai Avar Sosthamaakki, Anegam Pisaasugalaiyum Thuraththivittaar; Andhap Pisaasugal Thammai Arindhirundhapadiyaal, Avaigal Pesugiradharku Avar Idankodukkavillai.
35 avar Adhikaalaiyil, Iruttode Ezhundhu Purappattu, Vanaandharamaana Oridaththirkuppoi, Ange Jebampanninaar.
36 seemonum Avanode Irundhavargalum Avaraip Pin Thodarndhupoi,
37 avaraik Kandapodhu: Ummai Ellaarum Thedugiraargal Endru Sonnaargal.
38 avargalai Avar Nokki: Aduththa Oorgalilum Naan Pirasangam Pannavendumaadhalaal, Avvidangalukkup Povom Vaarungal; Idharkaagave Purappattu Vandhen Endru Solli;
39 galileyaa Naadengum Avargaludaiya Jebaaalayangalil Avar Pirasangam Pannikkondum, Pisaasugalaith Thuraththikkondum Irundhaar.
40 appozhudhu Kushtarogi Oruvan Avaridaththil Vandhu, Avar Munbaaga Muzhangaalpadiyittu: Umakku Siththamaanaal Ennai Suththamaakka Ummaal Aagum Endru Vendikkondaan.
41 yesu Manadhurugi, Kaiyai Neetti, Avanaith Thottu: Enakku Siththamundu, Suththamaagu Endraar.
42 ippadi Avar Sonnavudane, Kushtarogam Avanai Vittu Neengitru, Avan Suththamaanaan.
43 appozhudhu Avar Avanai Nokki: Nee Idhai Oruvarukkum Sollaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayiru;

44 aayinum Nee Poi, Aasaariyanukku Unnaik Kaanbiththu, Nee Suththamaanadhinimiththam Mose Kattalaiyittirukkiravaigalai Avargalukku Saatchiyaaga Seluththu Endru Kandippaai Solli, Udane Avanai Anuppivittaar.

45 avano Purappattup Poi: Indha Sangadhi Engum Vilangumpadiyaagap Pirasiththam Pannaththodanginaan. Adhinaal Avar Veliyarangamaai Pattanaththil Piravesikkakkoodaamal, Veliye Vanaandharamaana Idangalil Thangiyirundhaar; Eththisaiyilumirundhu Janangal Avaridaththirku Vandhaargal.
